Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Amblyomma defensin peptide 2 (ADP-2; Ticks, Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli (MIC=30 µM) and Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=7.5 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Two novel non-cationic defensin-like antimicrobial peptides from haemolymph of the female tick, Amblyomma hebraeum.
Literature.Author: Lai R, Lomas LO, Jonczy J, Turner PC, Rees HH.
